wikipedia_page.main: Sir Bernard Anthony Rix (born 8 December 1944) is a former English judge, who was a Lord Justice of Appeal from 2000 to 2013.

link_mentions.page: List of Honorary Fellows of New College, Oxford

response: Their son Otto Rix was able to flee to London in 1939 and could survive the Shoah. He became the father of Sir Bernard Rix, a judge, and of Evelyn McGilloway née Rix, a concert pianist.
